channel.title: Missing Textures - Fix
channel.description:
[b]People say there are missing textures on Black Mesa but there are no missing textures. You must set your DirectX Level for it to work[/b]
[b]Setting your DirectX Level[/b] [b]1. Go to Library[/b] [b]2. Right click on "Black Mesa"[/b] [b]3. Set Launch Options[/b] [b]4. Write -dxlevel 90[/b]
[b]This may cause lower fps but all textures will return to normal.[/b]

item.title: Missing Textures - Fix
item.dc:creator: Carlos091
item.description:
People say there are missing textures on Black Mesa but there are no missing textures. You must set your DirectX Level for it to work

Setting your DirectX Level
1. Go to Library
2. Right click on “Black Mesa”
3. Set Launch Options
4. Write -dxlevel 90

This may cause lower fps but all textures will return to normal.

Read full topic
